Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory9.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Find anything, Captain?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Negative. You?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Sigh... Negative.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui and Chrome walk out from both sides of the ruins and reconvene in front of a huge pit to exchange intel. In the center of this pit are two raindrop-shaped airdrop capsules.'}
{3: "The high temperature upon entry had severely deformed the airdrop capsules' exterior. After opening the hatch, hot air continues to emit from within the cabins."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I've never seen those interceptor drones we ran into during our descent.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Looks like they were deliberately trying to slow us down.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Well... Our mission is different this time.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Wretched bastards... What are more of those fools from Babylonia doing here? There's been enough delays already..."}
{3: 'A dark object flies toward Chrome and Kamui. Instinctively, the Strike Hawks separate just in the nick of time.'}
{3: 'After finding his footing, Chrome scans the flying object and discovers that it is a mechanical head emitting static electricity.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "It's... Troy from Ouroboros...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing Chrome utter this, Kamui sprints faster toward where the object is coming from.'}
{3: 'Right as he is about to reach the target position, Kamui swings his greatsword ferociously at the building in front of him, causing it to collapse.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: "Impatient, are we? No matter. This won't take long then.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Behind you, Kamui!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sound previously heard appears behind Kamui all of a sudden, and he is struck by a violent whirlwind.'}
{3: 'With the dull crunch of metal from the impact, Kamui is sent flying into the air.'}
{3: 'Right as Kamui is about to collide with the protruding steel bars in the distant ruins, a pale blue streak of lightning gallops across the ground.'}
{3: 'In a flash, the lightning grabs Kamui and pulls him up along the wall with the steel bars.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Thanks, Captain.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "The lightning gradually dissipates as Chrome reaches the top holding Kamui's hood."}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'So... Looks like we found the culprit behind all of this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "...That's not a Corrupted. Watch out, that's no ordinary enemy.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: "I'm looking for that fool dressed in white. Do you know where he is hiding now?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Nothing I can disclose currently.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: 'Oh? By the look of your nameplate, you must be from the same squad. If I kill you, that should draw him out of hiding.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hmph, give it your best shot.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Captain, let me go. I'm gonna smash his face in.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Kamui waves his greatsword in the air, but Chrome tightens his grip on Kamui's hood."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'We just need to buy time so we can find Wanshi and retreat.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Alright, got it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gear?', 3: 'What a waste of time.', 4: '1'}
